title: Mystery Gift Error
body: I was sending Mystery gifts to my friend and it sent a mystery gift to him but i didnt lose any rp for the gift and it doesnt show up that he was gifted the skin but he has the skin. What does this mean??

replies.body: This could be a visual glitch. If you restart your client, does the correct RP balance appear?
No the RP never left even after i restarted it and the skin still hasn't shown up for him but he still has it

WHY SAY IT?!?!? You could've just enjoyed that your free mystery gift to your friend, but noooo. You had to tell riot about it. I am so disappointed in your good intentions and honesty. You should've gifted yourself using that rp.
means you're lucky or need to restart
You broke the game, good job
